documents.document: Faultless I really add anything to the positive reviews that have already been submitted on this hotel. Just like to say that staff were friendly and attentive, the breakfasts and bar snacks were excellent and the rooms, although simple were of a very high quality. All in all a great stay and exceptional value for money compared to other London hotels. If I ever need to stay in London again would not hesitate to re-book the City Inn.One tip, book direct through the company website as this saved me on a 2 night stay compared to some of the leading online hotel reservation sites.
